name: Drift For Life
description:
The best racing simulation game

SINGLE-PLAYER:
- Win race cups and earn play-cash
- Get access to over 100 cars
- Discover all maps
- Get the best modification for your vehicle

MULTIPLAYER:
- Compete against real people in online championships
- Take first place in the available league
- Race and get access to vehicles
- Create your own room and invite your friends

Comes with this game:
- Tune your vehicle as you wish
- Create a unique image of your car with Spoiler, rims, etc
- The physics model offers the most realistic car dynamics ever offered
